about.summary: It provides generic methods that are used by more than one package, avoiding conflicts. This package will be imported by 'tidySingleCellExperiment' and 'tidyseurat'.
It provides generic methods that are used by more than one package, avoiding conflicts. This package will be imported by 'tidySingleCellExperiment' and 'tidyseurat'.

name: r-ttservice
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ttservice
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ttservice_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ttservice/ttservice_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: eb8eec2e3216df490c639c80ca9bc03309b6c351d2f0cf7ac8c8345b50d5a184

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-dplyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-dplyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ttservice')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ttservice')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ttservice
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: It provides generic methods that are used by more than one package, avoiding conflicts. This package will be imported by 'tidySingleCellExperiment' and 'tidyseurat'.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ttservice
# Type: Package
# Title: A Service for Tidy Transcriptomics Software Suite
# Version: 0.2.2
# Authors@R: c(person("Stefano", "Mangiola", email = "mangiolastefano@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")) )
# Description: It provides generic methods that are used by more than one package, avoiding conflicts. This package will be imported by 'tidySingleCellExperiment' and 'tidyseurat'.
# License: GPL-3
# Depends: R (>= 4.0.0)
# Imports: dplyr
# Suggests: methods
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.2.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2022-06-24 00:55:09 UTC; mangiola.s
# Author: Stefano Mangiola [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Stefano Mangiola <mangiolastefano@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2022-06-24 06:50:02 UTC
